FuncDef: This command configures the shaper s metering and optional profiling rates. The metering rate is used by the system to configure the shaper s PIR leaky bucket s decrement rate. The decrement function empties the bucket while packets applied to the bucket attempt to fill it based on the each packets size. If the bucket fills faster than how much is decremented per packet, the bucket s depth eventually reaches it's violate (PIR) threshold.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the exp-secondary-shaper rate. Values-max, 1 to 10000000 kb/s.
Specifies the monitor threshold size in kbytes. Values-0 to 8190.
